QuestData.Title: To Current Matters
QuestData.Description:
Ye've done good here, champion. MOTHER and I will be figurin' out what te do next.
Ye best get back te matters at hand, and do what ye can te empower that necklace o' yours.
I've got ways te reach ye once MOTHER and I have fixed things up here.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Azeroth is in danger, you're needed in Silithus!
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Halford Wyrmbane on the Wind's Redemption in Boralus.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Halford Wyrmbane on the Wind's Redemption in Boralus.
